1717ba08-0d20-452d-a226-df87c75d603b.plantuml_code:
@startuml
class WebInterface {
+url: String
+isAuthenticated: Boolean
+lastAccessTime: DateTime
+deviceType: String
+sessionId: String
+displayStatus(): void
+sendCommand(command: String): Boolean
+getDeviceList(): List
+logout(): void
}
class Refrigerating {
+currentTemp: Float
+targetTemp: Float
+isActive: Boolean
+doorStatus: String
+lastDefrost: DateTime
+setTargetTemp(temp: Float): void
+getCurrentTemp(): Float
+activate(): void
+deactivate(): void
}
class HomeController {
+controllerId: String
+firmwareVersion: String
+isOnline: Boolean
+location: String
+lastSync: DateTime
+syncDevices(): void
+updateFirmware(version: String): Boolean
+restart(): void
+getStatus(): String
}
class User {
+userId: String
+name: String
+email: String
+isAdmin: Boolean
+lastLogin: DateTime
+readTemperature(): Float
+setThermostat(temp: Float): Boolean
+monitorDevice(deviceId: String): String
+controlDevice(deviceId: String, action: String): Boolean
}
class Humidistat {
+currentHumidity: Float
+targetHumidity: Float
+isEnabled: Boolean
+location: String
+lastCalibration: DateTime
+setTargetHumidity(humidity: Float): void
+getCurrentHumidity(): Float
+enable(): void
+disable(): void
}
class HVAC {
+currentTemp: Float
+targetTemp: Float
+mode: String
+isRunning: Boolean
+lastService: DateTime
+setMode(mode: String): void
+setTargetTemp(temp: Float): void
+getCurrentTemp(): Float
+start(): void
}
class PowerSwitch {
+switchId: String
+isOn: Boolean
+location: String
+maxLoad: Float
+lastToggled: DateTime
+turnOn(): void
+turnOff(): void
+toggle(): void
+getStatus(): Boolean
}
class Sensor {
+sensorId: String
+type: String
+value: Float
+location: String
+lastReadTime: DateTime
+readValue(): Float
+saveValue(): Boolean
+calibrate(): void
+getType(): String
}
class Planner {
+plannerId: String
+schedule: String
+isActive: Boolean
+lastUpdate: DateTime
+ownerId: String
+createSchedule(schedule: String): Boolean
+updateSchedule(schedule: String): Boolean
+activate(): void
+deactivate(): void
}
' Relationships
class Webinterface {
  -webinterfaceId: string
  +name: string
  -isActive: boolean
  +getWebinterfaceId(): string
  +setName(name: string): void
  +isValid(): boolean
}
class Homecontroller {
  -homecontrollerId: string
  +name: string
  -isActive: boolean
  +getHomecontrollerId(): string
  +setName(name: string): void
  +isValid(): boolean
}
class Hvac {
  -hvacId: string
  +name: string
  -isActive: boolean
  +getHvacId(): string
  +setName(name: string): void
  +isValid(): boolean
}
class Powerswitch {
  -powerswitchId: string
  +name: string
  -isActive: boolean
  +getPowerswitchId(): string
  +setName(name: string): void
  +isValid(): boolean
}
class Hvac {
  -hvacId: string
  +name: string
  -isActive: boolean
  +getHvacId(): string
  +setName(name: string): void
  +isValid(): boolean
}
WebInterface --> "1" HomeController : communicates
WebInterface --> "0..1" User : authenticates
User --> "1" HomeController : controls
User --> "0..*" Planner : uses
User --> "0..*" PowerSwitch : controls
User --> "0..*" HVAC : setsTemperature
User --> "0..*" Humidistat : setsHumidity
User --> "0..*" Refrigerating : controls
HomeController --> "0..*" Sensor : manages
HomeController --> "0..*" PowerSwitch : manages
HomeController --> "0..*" HVAC : manages
HomeController --> "0..*" Humidistat : manages
HomeController --> "0..*" Refrigerating : manages
HomeController --> "0..*" Planner : schedules
Sensor --> "1" HomeController : reportsTo
Sensor --> "0..*" HVAC : monitors
Sensor --> "0..*" Humidistat : monitors
Sensor --> "0..*" Refrigerating : monitors
HVAC --> "1" HomeController : controlledBy
HVAC --> "0..*" Sensor : uses
HVAC --> "0..*" PowerSwitch : powers
Humidistat --> "1" HomeController : controlledBy
Humidistat --> "0..*" Sensor : uses
Refrigerating --> "1" HomeController : controlledBy
Refrigerating --> "0..*" Sensor : uses
PowerSwitch --> "1" HomeController : controlledBy
Planner --> "1" HomeController : managedBy
Planner --> "1" User : ownedBy
  --
  --
  --
  --
  --
Hvac -- HomeController : interacts
Webinterface -- HomeController : interacts
Homecontroller -- HomeController : interacts
Powerswitch -- HomeController : interacts
@enduml

errors: PlantUML validation failed: 500: PlantUML validation failed: 'DiagramService' object has no attribute 'validate_plantuml_syntax'

83713f50-1330-4caf-bc18-8a84ed491877.error_message: PlantUML syntax errors: PlantUML validation failed: 500: PlantUML validation failed: 'DiagramService' object has no attribute 'validate_plantuml_syntax'
83713f50-1330-4caf-bc18-8a84ed491877.plantuml_code:
@startuml
participant Webinterface
participant Homecontroller
participant Hvac
participant Powerswitch
participant Hvac
' Participant Declarations
actor User
participant WebInterface
participant Refrigerating
participant HomeController
participant Humidistat
participant HVAC
participant PowerSwitch
participant Sensor
participant Planner
== User Accesses Web Interface ==
activate User
User -> WebInterface : Login and authenticate
activate WebInterface
WebInterface --> User : Authentication result
deactivate WebInterface
deactivate User
== User Reads Temperature ==
activate User
User -> WebInterface : Request current temperature
activate WebInterface
WebInterface -> HomeController : Fetch temperature at thermostat position
activate HomeController
HomeController -> Sensor : Read temperature value
activate Sensor
Sensor --> HomeController : Temperature value
deactivate Sensor
HomeController --> WebInterface : Temperature data
deactivate HomeController
WebInterface --> User : Display temperature
deactivate WebInterface
deactivate User
== User Sets Thermostat Temperature ==
activate User
User -> WebInterface : Set thermostat temperature (60-80°F)
activate WebInterface
WebInterface -> HomeController : Update thermostat setpoint
activate HomeController
alt Valid temperature (60-80°F)
HomeController -> Humidistat : Adjust temperature setpoint
activate Humidistat
Humidistat --> HomeController : Setpoint updated
deactivate Humidistat
HomeController --> WebInterface : Setpoint confirmation
else Invalid temperature
HomeController --> WebInterface : Error: Out of range
end
deactivate HomeController
WebInterface --> User : Setpoint update result
deactivate WebInterface
deactivate User
== Sensor Reads and Saves Value ==
activate Sensor
Sensor -> HomeController : Send environmental reading
activate HomeController
HomeController -> Planner : Save value to home database
activate Planner
Planner --> HomeController : Value saved
deactivate Planner
HomeController --> Sensor : Save confirmation
deactivate HomeController
deactivate Sensor
== User Controls Home Devices ==
activate User
User -> WebInterface : Control lights, security, appliances
activate WebInterface
par Device Control
group Lights
WebInterface -> PowerSwitch : Toggle lights
activate PowerSwitch
PowerSwitch --> WebInterface : Lights toggled
deactivate PowerSwitch
end
group Security
WebInterface -> HomeController : Arm/disarm security
activate HomeController
HomeController --> WebInterface : Security status updated
deactivate HomeController
end
group Appliances
WebInterface -> PowerSwitch : Toggle appliance state
activate PowerSwitch
PowerSwitch --> WebInterface : Appliance state updated
deactivate PowerSwitch
end
end
deactivate WebInterface
deactivate User
== Environmental Control ==
activate Planner
Planner -> HomeController : Evaluate environmental conditions
activate HomeController
alt Need Cooling
HomeController -> Refrigerating : Activate cooling
activate Refrigerating
Refrigerating --> HomeController : Cooling activated
deactivate Refrigerating
else Need Heating
HomeController -> HVAC : Activate heating
activate HVAC
HVAC --> HomeController : Heating activated
deactivate HVAC
else Humidity Adjustment Needed
HomeController -> Humidistat : Adjust humidity
activate Humidistat
Humidistat --> HomeController : Humidity adjusted
deactivate Humidistat
end
HomeController --> Planner : Environmental control updated
deactivate HomeController
deactivate Planner
== Reference to Other Diagrams ==
ref over WebInterface, HomeController : See "Lighting Control Sequence" for advanced lighting scenarios

== Additional Interactions ==
Hvac -> HomeController : performs action
HomeController --> Hvac : confirmation
Webinterface -> HomeController : performs action
HomeController --> Webinterface : confirmation
Homecontroller -> HomeController : performs action
HomeController --> Homecontroller : confirmation
Powerswitch -> HomeController : performs action
HomeController --> Powerswitch : confirmation
@enduml
